divs: Sighting DetailsI watched this white light sphere come directly from Mt. Tamalpais towards my backyard, It changed color to orange red - I took pictures from my iphone - then it turned back into white oval��������� Wondering if anyone out there can please check out my pictures and tell me what you think!!!
